quality_assessment: Subsection is essentially empty with only a header. This is critical missing content as best practices are important for users to understand proper configuration management.

issues.description: Subsection is completely empty except for a header. Users need guidance on configuration management best practices.
issues.fix_suggestion: Add comprehensive best practices covering: file organization, precedence rules, security considerations, environment management, profile usage, secret management, and configuration validation

issues.description: No guidance on organizing config.yml vs workflow.yml or global vs project configuration
issues.fix_suggestion: Document when to use global config vs project config, separation of concerns between config.yml and workflow.yml, and best practices for organizing configuration files

issues.description: No best practices for leveraging the precedence chain effectively
issues.fix_suggestion: Document best practices for using the precedence hierarchy: CLI flags > env vars > project config > global config > defaults. Include examples of when to use each level.

issues.description: No guidance on securing sensitive configuration data like API keys
issues.fix_suggestion: Document best practices for handling secrets: using environment variables for sensitive data, avoiding committing secrets to git, using secret: true for masking, and considering external secret providers

issues.description: No best practices for using profiles for different environments
issues.fix_suggestion: Document best practices for profile usage: naming conventions (dev, staging, prod), what to put in profiles vs global config, activation methods, and common profile patterns

issues.description: No guidance on validating configuration before execution
issues.fix_suggestion: Document validation practices: using 'prodigy validate', checking YAML syntax, verifying required fields, and testing configuration changes in isolation

issues.description: No best practices for when to use environment variables vs configuration files
issues.fix_suggestion: Document strategy for environment variables: when to use env vars vs config files, naming conventions, using .env files, and environment-specific overrides

issues.description: No guidance on sharing configuration across projects or team members
issues.fix_suggestion: Document patterns for configuration reusability: using global config for user preferences, using project config for project-specific settings, and sharing configuration via version control

issues.description: No troubleshooting guidance specific to best practices
issues.fix_suggestion: Add cross-reference to the configuration troubleshooting section and mention common configuration mistakes to avoid
